DOC.brief_summary: We conduct randomized trial determine effect provide family Bogota , Colombia , one month supply one two cooking oil , sunflower oil vs. soybean oil , whole blood saliva fatty acid composition child . The aim : 1 ) ass effect oil whole blood fatty acid composition child , 2 ) ass correlation whole blood saliva evaluate fatty acid measure saliva would adequate biomarkers intake . The study conduct context ongoing cohort study school child Bogotá , Colombia ( HUM00043252 ) . We conduct intervention trial 4 week duration . Participant family randomly assign either sunflower oil soybean oil . Families visit two time 4 week period . We collect dietary information person household charge food preparation , child . At end intervention collect information whether like oil whether would willing use , exclusively , two year , assess acceptability long intervention . We also collect two finger prick blood sample two saliva/cheek cell sample child , begin end study , evaluate compliance assess impact intervention .
